modName: Daedric Nodachi Katana Tanto Wakizashi - the Resharpening
summary: New sharper look for the Daedric Nodachi from the Weapons of the Third Era MoS edition. Also changes Katana, Tanto and Wakizashi to look sharper and deadlier!
descriptionHtml:
I was annoyed by the dull look of the Daedric Nodachi from the Weapons of the Third Era MoS edition. So I changed the textures a bit to make it look much sharper and deadlier. Also changed the handle a bit for more awesomeness. I\'ve tried to keep as much detail on the blade as possible, so this is not just a \"blurred\" version.

The same texture is used for Tanto, Wakizashi and Katana as well, so you will change the whole set with this file!

[b]Only works with the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12892]Weapons of the Third Era MoS edition[/url]![/b]

[b]Installation:[/b]
- download and install the mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12892]Weapons of the Third Era MoS edition[/url]
- download this texture pack
- place the texture files from the archive in the directory ...\\Skyrim\\data\\textures\\74_mos\\nodachis\\
- go slice many tomatoes!!
author: Blue66

files.name: Daedric Nodachi Katana Tanto Wakizashi - the Resharpening
